properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 8:03PM CST until February 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has reissued a Flood Warning
for the Yalobusha river at Calhoun City.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Yalobusha River at Calhoun City
* until Wednesday February 12.
* At 7 PM Tuesday the stage was...23.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
* At 23.0 feet...Widespread lowland and agricultural flooding is
occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
